com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.Event
      • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UsesCustomNull
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent, BleServer.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent
    Enclosing interface:
    BleNode.ConnectionFailListener

    public abstract static class BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent
extends Event
implements UsesCustomNull
    Abstract base class for structures passed to BleServer.ConnectionFailListener.onEvent(BleServer.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent) and BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.onEvent(BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent) to provide more info about how/why a connection failed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Interval attemptTime_latest()
      How long the last connection attempt took before failing.
      Interval attemptTime_total()
      How long it's been since BleDevice.connect() (or overloads) were initially called.
      BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.AutoConnectUsage autoConnectUsage()
      Whether autoConnect=true was passed to BluetoothDevice.connectGatt(Context, boolean, android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCallback).
      int failureCountSoFar()
      The failure count so far.
      int gattStatus()
      The gattStatus returned, if applicable, from native callbacks like BluetoothGattCallback.onConnectionStateChange(BluetoothGatt, int, int) or BluetoothGattCallback.onServicesDiscovered(BluetoothGatt, int).

      • Methods inherited from class com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.Event

        isFor, isForAll, isForAny

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        isNull

    • Method Detail

      • failureCountSoFar

        public int failureCountSoFar()
        The failure count so far. This will start at 1 and keep incrementing for more failures.

      • attemptTime_latest

        public Interval attemptTime_latest()
        How long the last connection attempt took before failing.

      • attemptTime_total

        public Interval attemptTime_total()
        How long it's been since BleDevice.connect() (or overloads) were initially called.

      • gattStatus

        public int gattStatus()
        The gattStatus returned, if applicable, from native callbacks like BluetoothGattCallback.onConnectionStateChange(BluetoothGatt, int, int) or BluetoothGattCallback.onServicesDiscovered(BluetoothGatt, int). If not applicable, for example if BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent.status() is BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status.EXPLICIT_DISCONNECT, then this is set to BleStatuses.GATT_STATUS_NOT_APPLICABLE.

        See BleDevice.ReadWriteListener.ReadWriteEvent.gattStatus() for more information about gatt status codes in general.
        See Also:
        BleDevice.ReadWriteListener.ReadWriteEvent.gattStatus()

      • autoConnectUsage

        public BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.AutoConnectUsage autoConnectUsage()
        Whether autoConnect=true was passed to BluetoothDevice.connectGatt(Context, boolean, android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCallback). See more discussion at BleNodeConfig.alwaysUseAutoConnect.
